content.text: Match ends, Las Palmas 4, Ponferradina 2.
Second Half ends, Las Palmas 4, Ponferradina 2.
Offside, Las Palmas. Juan Carlos Valerón tries a through ball, but Guzmán is caught offside.
Hernán Santana (Las Palmas) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Tete (Ponferradina) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Hernán Santana (Las Palmas).
Juan Carlos Valerón (Las Palmas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Tete (Ponferradina).
Attempt missed. Yuri (Ponferradina) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Óscar Ramírez with a cross.
Corner,  Ponferradina. Conceded by David Simón.
Vicente Gómez (Las Palmas) is shown the yellow card.
Offside, Las Palmas. Hernán Santana tries a through ball, but Vicente Gómez is caught offside.
Alfredo Ortuño (Las Palmas) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by José Rueda (Ponferradina).
Substitution, Las Palmas. Juan Carlos Valerón replaces Sergio Araujo.
Attempt blocked. Vicente Gómez (Las Palmas) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Guzmán with a cross.
Corner,  Las Palmas. Conceded by Julen Castañeda.
Casto (Las Palmas) is shown the yellow card.
Substitution, Ponferradina. Gonzalo Melero replaces Jonathan Ruiz.
Attempt missed. Pablo Infante (Ponferradina) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Acorán.
Attempt missed. Sergio Araujo (Las Palmas) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Vicente Gómez.
Jon Gaztañaga (Ponferradina) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Substitution, Ponferradina. José Rueda replaces Andy.
Substitution, Ponferradina. Tete replaces Jesús Berrocal because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Jesús Berrocal (Ponferradina) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Vicente Gómez (Las Palmas) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Alfredo Ortuño.
Goal!  Las Palmas 4, Ponferradina 2. Alfredo Ortuño (Las Palmas) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Guzmán following a fast break.
Attempt missed. Jesús Berrocal (Ponferradina) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Jonathan Ruiz with a cross.
Goal!  Las Palmas 3, Ponferradina 2. Yuri (Ponferradina) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal following a set piece situation.
Penalty saved! Yuri (Ponferradina) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
David García (Las Palmas) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Penalty Ponferradina. Julen Castañeda draws a foul in the penalty area.
